func.title: PathFree2

param.name: x1
param.desc: X coordinate of the start point

param.name: y1
param.desc: Y coordinate of the start point

param.name: x2
param.desc: X coordinate of the end point

param.name: y2
param.desc: Y coordinate of the end point

func.desc: Works like PathFree, but instead returns an array containing the coordinates of the first solid pixel found on line. Returns nil if the path is free.
func.remark: All coordinates are global, even in local calls.

example.text: Creates an Idol somewhere on the surface of the landscape.
